h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Preservation Orb Location
content: The Preservation Orb can be found in The Webbed Hollow, in a box at the start of the Purple Cloud Mountain Secret area. This is only accessible after completing Chapter 4, providing you haven't finished the area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Preservation_Orb.md', within the main section titled 'Preservation Orb', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Preservation Orb Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Preservation Orb can be found in The Webbed Hollow, in a box at the start of the Purple Cloud Mountain Secret area. This is only accessible after completing Chapter 4, providing you haven't finished the area.
